programme.title: MR. ZOO: THE MISSING VIP
programme.desc: After discovering he can suddenly talk to animals, an intelligence agent partners with a canine pal to handle a case that has gone sideways.

programme.title: THE MAGICIAN
programme.desc: A talented young magician falls for a princess betrothed to his former teacher, leading to a fierce showdown between the two powerful magicians.

programme.title: BEAR MAN
programme.desc: Two bears from the Institute of techonolgy have turned into humans after eating garlic and mugwort. Yet, one has grown up into a police, while one has become a gangster...

programme.title: THE NEGOTIATION
programme.desc: An arms dealer kidnapped two Koreans in Bangkok where the hostages were in fact held in an abandoned children's home in South Korea, when the kidnapper's motivations becomes clearer.

programme.title: RACE TO FREEDOM: UM BOK DONG
programme.desc: K-pop star Rain portrays Um Bok-dong, an unlikely hero in a government-organized bicycle race during the Japanese colonial era. Defeating Japanese rivals, his victories inspire locals and resistance fighters.

programme.title: BEHIND THE SHADOWS
programme.desc: Yun-ho, born weak and destined to die young, is drawn to his loyal friend, Jae-un. In the conservative Joseon Dynasty, Yun-ho disguises as a girl to confess his love to Jae-un before his arranged marriage.

programme.title: DEADMAN
programme.desc: An ace in the barge business makes money by selling his name, is falsely accused of embezzling billions. He fights to reclaim his stolen life from those tied to him solely by name.

programme.title: INNOCENT WITNESS
programme.desc: A housekeeper is charged with murder. Her attorney is surprised to learn the only witness to the crime is a teenage girl with Asperger's. Will the girl be able to provide a valid statement?

programme.title: PENINSULA
programme.desc: Set four years after the zombie outbreak, a former soldier and his team return to the zombie-infested wastelands to retrieve a truck of money and try to escape from it alive.

programme.title: Catch the Ghost Ep3
programme.desc: Yoo Ryung, a zealous rookie detective meets Go Ji-suk, a station chief who avoids cases and seeks stability. He ends up cleaning up after the problems she causes and starts his life anew.

programme.title: Catch the Ghost Ep4
programme.desc: Yoo Ryung, a zealous rookie detective meets Go Ji-suk, a station chief who avoids cases and seeks stability. He ends up cleaning up after the problems she causes and starts his life anew.

programme.title: LOVE, LIES
programme.desc: A gisaeng is consumed by jealousy after her friend finds success as a pop singer and her lover falls for her. Feeling betrayed, things begin to fall apart as she tries to regain the things she lost.

programme.title: FIST & FURIOUS
programme.desc: A former detective grants permission to a freelance video journalist to cover his revenge journey on a mob boss whom previously killed his partner during an investigation.

programme.title: MY WORST NEIGHBOR
programme.desc: In a house with little soundproofing, a man and a woman living next door started a noise war. They then cohabitate through the wall, and catching up in subtle emotions...

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Captain Underpants becomes a wanted man in underwear when footage surfaces of a robber who looks exactly like him. George and Harold, positive it's an impostor, try to track down the perp and bring him to justice. But can the boys do this before Captain Underpants is found guilty?

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: As a prank, George and Harold use Melvin's new animal hybrid invention to create a creature that's a cross between a butt and a fly. But some of the monster butt-erflies want to eat everything in sight- including the students hiding out in the school gym!

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: After helping George and Harold make a comic featuring the heroine Plungerina, Erica asserts that Plungerina could be better that Captain Underpants. To prove her wrong, the boys decide to actually create the villain in the comic and then have Captain Underpants save the day. Unfortunately, Krupp - and therefore Captain Underpants - is away at a principals' convention.There's no one to save them...until a real life Plungerina saves tthe day! But who is really Plungerina?

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: When Krupp transfers to another school, George and Harold follow, only to find a bizarro version of Jerome Horwitz Elementary, where the teachers are nice and the kids are well-behaved. But no one's having any fun! George and Harold want to right this wrong with pranks and comics. But Krupp enlists Mr. Neamer (bizarro Meaner), who then super-enlargers his brain and becomes Brainy Blabulous, in order to stop the subversion of authority.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: In order to spice up their field trip to Romeinday (an ancient Rome reenactment park), George and Harold trick Melvin into turning the bus into a time machine so they can travel to actual ancient Rome and be gladiators. After offending Caesar with their comic, the emperor is accidentally turned into Cruelius Sneezer and pursues the school group with all his might.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: In honor of Dump Day in Piqua- celebrating the creation of the dump - George and Harold try to earn extra credit by creating a trash-alanche. But Melvin creates an invention to suck all the trash into another dimension. The plan backfires when Tubbadump, a trash-covered monster, emerges from that dimension for revenge on the trashmakers.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: In part one of a two-part season finale, the Melvins create a final exam that George and Harold will be sure to fail: the Doom Dome. To ensure success, Melvinborg injects Melvin's cells with nanobots, giving him heightened powers. But when George and Harold find out, they crank the nanobots to the max, causing Melvin to grow into a giant! The boys enlist Captain Underpants to fight the jealous nerd, but their victory only loses the nanobots onto Piqua...

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Part two of the season finale finds George, Harold, Captain Underpants, and the Melvins trapped in the Doom Dome with rampaging nanobots. programme.title: Wildest Survival
programme.desc: In this episode we witness nature’s most extraordinary animal migrations, and discover the lengths they must go to, in order to survive.

programme.title: Wildest Survival
programme.desc: Baby Animals: Protecting babies against extreme conditions, hungry predators, and the threat of starvation, all animals must fight for the future of their species.

programme.title: Wildest Survival
programme.desc: The instinct to secure a mate is one of the most powerful that there is. From the beautiful to the bizarre, this episode explores the most amazing mating rituals from right across the animal kingdom.

programme.title: Wildest Survival
programme.desc: This episode explores the world’s most toxic animals, revealing how poison and venom have given them the edge over the competition in their fight for survival.

programme.title: Destination China: Yunnan
programme.desc: Destination China will take the audience to some of Yunnan's most beautiful and stunning landscapes and homes to around 6000 species of plants, 200 mammals and 500 species of birds.

programme.title: Destination China: Yunnan
programme.desc: Destination China will take the audience to some of Yunnan's most beautiful and stunning landscapes and homes to around 6000 species of plants, 200 mammals and 500 species of birds.

programme.title: The Rhino Orphanage
programme.desc: It takes patience and commitment for The Rhino Orphanage, as they nurture young rhinos whose mothers have been lost to poaching.

programme.title: The Rhino Orphanage
programme.desc: The two oldest rhinos are set to be released back into the wild. Three rhinos cause a stir as they go missing, while the younger rhinos make steady progress toward health and happiness.

programme.title: The Rhino Orphanage
programme.desc: The poaching crisis intensifies and poachers turn their attention to orphanages. After losing her mother, four-week-old Jamila finally finds sanctuary at The Rhino Orphanage.

programme.title: Wildest Survival S2
programme.desc: From birth life is filled with risk - and reward. To reach adulthood, animals must constantly overcome incredible obstacles. They must learn to find food, secure a home, attract a mate, and raise the next generation with only one thing on their mind - staying alive.

programme.title: Wildest Survival S2
programme.desc: From finding a mate in the branches, to adapting to life at height, tree dwelling animals have evolved unique traits to ensure they thrive in this hostile and complex environment.

programme.title: Wildest Survival S2
programme.desc: Using ingenious adaptations, and devious techniques, prey species have evolved incredible tricks to escape from the jaws of death.

programme.title: Wildest Survival S2
programme.desc: Reptiles, amphibians, insects and fish are found in every corner of our world - and for this special group of animals, life is regulated by the sun.

programme.title: Wildest Survival S2
programme.desc: Being just that little bit different, can bring huge advantages, but it also presents almighty challenges. By going against the grain, these animals have found unique ways to stay alive.

programme.title: Naledi: A Baby Elephant's Tale
programme.desc: Naledi follows the journey of a baby elephant orphaned in a rescue camp, as the man tasked with her survival races to protect an entire species while fighting to save her life.

programme.title: Destination Myanmar
programme.desc: Destination Myanmar will take the audience to some of Myanmar's most beautiful and stunning Asian Heritage wetlands with fishermen paddling one-legged along shallow waters and floating gardens.

programme.title: Oceans Africa
programme.desc: This episode follows the journeys of these magnificent humpbacks, from their feeding grounds to their breeding grounds, the tender moments between mother and calf, and see the dangers their calves face in their first few months, including incredible interactions with predatory killer whales. The humpbacks also face a world full of human threats, from large container ships, to the impact of seismic testing in the search for oil and gas, now threatening their very survival once more.

programme.title: Oceans Africa
programme.desc: Often referred to as the dinosaur fish, the coelacanth occupies a unique place in the fossil record, and when it was rediscovered almost a century ago it shook the scientific community. We follow its journey to the present day, accompanying WildOceans' scientists on an expedition to uncover more of their secrets and behaviours.

programme.title: Oceans Africa
programme.desc: In A 'Tale Of Two Sharks' we take a look at the incredible array of sharks found off the South African coast, focusing on the endangered Scalloped Hammerhead and the iconic Great White.

programme.title: Aging In The Wild
programme.desc: In this episode we meet some animal elders who help us understand the psychological mechanisms associated with long life and the positive social value long-lived animals bring to their communities.

programme.title: Aging In The Wild
programme.desc: Meet some late-life lovers and explore the reasons behind their sexual longevity and their ability to reproduce well into their later years.

programme.title: Aging In The Wild
programme.desc: What does it take to maintain alpha status as animals grow older? We investigate the responsibilities and challenges that come with being a senior leader of a pack.

programme.title: Aging In The Wild
programme.desc: We explore the integral role that older animals play in their communities and investigate how animals learn over the course of their lives.

programme.title: Aging In The Wild
programme.desc: Human, plant, animal, bacteria, all have one inevitable thing in common; death. In this episode we discover the ways in which aging animals defy our usual understanding of the circle of life.

programme.title: Wild Warrior Encounters
programme.desc: Meet the new wild warrior volunteers, as they are introduced to Imire’s extended animal family. Getting dirty is part of the job. And of course, there are always striking surprises at any moment.

programme.title: Wild Warrior Encounters
programme.desc: In this episode, we witness a desperate mission to save a spooked impala. The intelligence of these anti poaching elephants astounds everyone. And, there is always time for fun tasks.

programme.title: Wild Warrior Encounters
programme.desc: In this episoden the volunteers experience close up encounters with iconic creatures. Immersion into Imire’s anti-poaching efforts. And, nothing stands in the way of hard work.

programme.title: Wild Warrior Encounters
programme.desc: Volunteers explore the community’s role in conservation, with thrilling honey harvesting, a new addition to the team, and a dream come true as one feeds a black rhino.

programme.title: Wild Warrior Encounters
programme.desc: In this engaging episode, Reilly shares his rhino release dream. It’s time for Judy’s beloved duiker to return to the wild. And, a routine nyala capture takes an unexpected turn.

programme.title: Wild Warrior Encounters
programme.desc: In this episode, a warthog retrieval mission goes awry. Meet the matriarch of Imire, a wonderful elephant that has a unique story. It’s time to say farewell to the Imire family.

programme.title: Wildest Survival S2
programme.desc: Meet the extraordinary miniature animals, who use their small size to survive against all odds in the world’s most deadly environments.

programme.title: Wildest Survival S2

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Captain Underpants becomes a wanted man in underwear when footage surfaces of a robber who looks exactly like him. George and Harold, positive it's an impostor, try to track down the perp and bring him to justice. But can the boys do this before Captain Underpants is found guilty?

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: As a prank, George and Harold use Melvin's new animal hybrid invention to create a creature that's a cross between a butt and a fly. But some of the monster butt-erflies want to eat everything in sight- including the students hiding out in the school gym!

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: After helping George and Harold make a comic featuring the heroine Plungerina, Erica asserts that Plungerina could be better that Captain Underpants. To prove her wrong, the boys decide to actually create the villain in the comic and then have Captain Underpants save the day. Unfortunately, Krupp - and therefore Captain Underpants - is away at a principals' convention.There's no one to save them...until a real life Plungerina saves tthe day! But who is really Plungerina?

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: When Krupp transfers to another school, George and Harold follow, only to find a bizarro version of Jerome Horwitz Elementary, where the teachers are nice and the kids are well-behaved. But no one's having any fun! George and Harold want to right this wrong with pranks and comics. But Krupp enlists Mr. Neamer (bizarro Meaner), who then super-enlargers his brain and becomes Brainy Blabulous, in order to stop the subversion of authority.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: In order to spice up their field trip to Romeinday (an ancient Rome reenactment park), George and Harold trick Melvin into turning the bus into a time machine so they can travel to actual ancient Rome and be gladiators. After offending Caesar with their comic, the emperor is accidentally turned into Cruelius Sneezer and pursues the school group with all his might.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: In honor of Dump Day in Piqua- celebrating the creation of the dump - George and Harold try to earn extra credit by creating a trash-alanche. But Melvin creates an invention to suck all the trash into another dimension. The plan backfires when Tubbadump, a trash-covered monster, emerges from that dimension for revenge on the trashmakers.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: In part one of a two-part season finale, the Melvins create a final exam that George and Harold will be sure to fail: the Doom Dome. To ensure success, Melvinborg injects Melvin's cells with nanobots, giving him heightened powers. But when George and Harold find out, they crank the nanobots to the max, causing Melvin to grow into a giant! The boys enlist Captain Underpants to fight the jealous nerd, but their victory only loses the nanobots onto Piqua...

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Part two of the season finale finds George, Harold, Captain Underpants, and the Melvins trapped in the Doom Dome with rampaging nanobots. When the humans try to neautralize the bots, they find a new host: Captain Underpants. Now they must shrink down to go into Captain Underpants’ brain and defeat the nanobots’ leader, Nanozero. But they need help: Captain Underpants’ brain cells to the rescue! And when it’s all over, George and Harold will finally be able to go to summer camp.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: Struggling to find their purpose on the Betterman farm, the Croods see an opportunity to prove their worth by harvesting Phil’s perilous (and sticky) bounceberries.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: When Eep wants alone time with her new friend Dawn, Guy seeks a new friend of his own and finds an unlikely companion in Thunk.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: When the Bettermans invite the Croods to join their family game night, two things become clear: Phil needs to win and Grug hates to lose.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: After a crowverine gliding mishap, Dawn loses her confidence and tells Eep she's taking a break from adventures. Eep convinces Dawn to join her on one last adventure – climbing Grrr Mountain.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: When Hope oversteps by trying to teach Sandy manners, Ugga gets her revenge by challenging Hope to do the impossible: civilize Thunk.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: Ugga has a secret - she's taking Eep to "flop with the bulrusses" - a fun and dangerous pastime Ugga enjoyed as a teen. Ugga's excitement fades when Hope invites herself and Dawn along.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: Bored of the viewing options on window, Thunk realizes what he’s been missing – real life drama! But when Thunk starts creating drama around the farm, the others set out to teach him a lesson.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: Sandy is finally old enough to join Grug and Eep for the annual Daddy Daughter Day and Grug couldn’t be more excited. But when Sandy struggles to fit in with Grug and Eep’s traditions, Grug has second thoughts. It isn’t until Sandy goes missing that Grug realizes it’s time to start a new tradition.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: When Phil humiliates himself playing throw-go-nut with the punch monkeys, the Croods band together to help him regain his confidence. Unfortunately, Phil goes from confident to cocky and bets the farm on a game of throw-go-nut with the punch monkeys. Can the Croods overcome the punch monkeys - and Phil - to save the farm?

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Looking to trim costs, Boss unknowingly fires Boom Baby, a super-undercover Baby Corp worker who displays to parents how unsafe things are by pratfalling on them and crying for attention. Convinced he's the victim of a conspiracy, Boom leaves a wake of parent worry in his path, forcing Boss to stop him.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: After Boss accidentally sells Tim's favorite Football Mike toy at a family yard sale, he shirks his duties as a CEO to try to get it back. But the villains pick up on his one weakness, his brother, and so begins a game of elaborate keep-away.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: The combined villains have taken over Baby Corp HQ, and a disastrous chupie teleportation accident has all the office babies scattered to the wind. Boss has to regain his leadership gusto to convince Baby Corp to regroup, as Tim and Danny share an emotional last day together before Danny leaves town for good.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: When Phil humiliates himself playing throw-go-nut with the punch monkeys, the Croods band together to help him regain his confidence. Unfortunately, Phil goes from confident to cocky and bets the farm on a game of throw-go-nut with the punch monkeys. Can the Croods overcome the punch monkeys - and Phil - to save the farm?

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree

programme.desc: Some provocative episodes from Season 5 of CSI involve Russian mail order brides ("Nesting Dolls"), infantism ("King Baby"), and the Mexican lifestyle of narcocorrido ("Snakes"). From the creative storytelling ("4x4") to the macabre ("Who Shot Sherlock?"), there’s something in Season 5 for everyone. The CSI team investigates many crimes that hit close to home as well. Grissom comes under fire from Ecklie ("Mea Culpa"), Brass tracks down his estranged daughter ("Hollywood Brass"), and during the course of the season Greg Sanders completes his transition from the lab to the field. Last, but not least, Season 5 wraps with an amazing two-part episode ("Grave Danger"), written and directed by Quentin Tarantino, where Nick comes face to face with death while the team exhausts all its resources to same him.

programme.title: Dark Marvels
programme.desc: The dark origin stories behind some of history's most notorious methods of execution, from the guillotine to the electric chair.

programme.title: Pieta 1
programme.desc: The movie tells the story of Amanda (Charito Solis) and her unconditional love for her son Rigor (Ace Vergel). Rigor grows up not having to follow any rules and he does not cultivate a conscience. In his dealings with the underworld, he meets syndicate head Johnny Wilson. Will this pave the way for his all-out excursion to evil?

programme.title: Bilang Na Ang Araw Mo
programme.desc: Martin and Rafael were childhood friends who grew up on different sides of the law. Martin became a hired killer, while Rafael turned into a respected defense lawyer.

programme.title: Afuang: Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Abner Afuang is an honest to goodness cop who labors to keep the honor of his badge. Fighting ruthless criminals, he has acquired the fury of the syndicates he is fighting.

programme.title: SPO1 Don Juan (Da Dancing Policeman)
programme.desc: Leo Martinez is a policeman who directs traffic with choreographed dance movements. Unknown to him he has a look-alike who takes advantage of his popularity with motorists by directing traffic for get-away cars during robberies.

programme.title: Dapat Ka Bang Mahalin?
programme.desc: The story, which was based on a popular comic’s serial, closely resembled what would later happen in real life to local moviedom's favorite couple. Sharon and Gabby portrayed teenagers who eloped and got married against the advice of everybody.

programme.title: Wanted: Perfect Mother
programme.desc: A dashing widower named Dante (Christopher De Leon) is scouting for a tutor for his daughter, then a girl named Sam (Regine Velasquez) walks in and turned their once lonely home into a carnival.

programme.title: Ang Pagbabalik Ni Pedro Penduko (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Pedro Penduko (Janno Gibbs) who was decreed by a hermit as the savior of the world, which was under an evil curse. To fulfill his destiny, he had to go back in time and fight with the malevolent pair from hell, Lucifero and Lucifera.

programme.title: Dear Diary
programme.desc: Two teen stories for one starring talented young actor Herbert Bautista. In one story, he was a houseboy who striked up a friendship with the girl. In the other story, he and his friends played detective.

programme.title: Sabado Nights
programme.desc: This is a tale of love and friendship among three young women, whose lives centered on what they do every Saturday night.

programme.title: The Maggie Dela Riva Story
programme.desc: Maggie Dela Riva was a popular young actress in 1969 when she was abducted and raped by four men from rich, influential families. Concerned about the rising number of crimes against women, Maggie came out of retirement to once more tell her story.

programme.title: Tropang Bulilit
programme.desc: Ric Rodrigo dies and he leaves his five children orphaned. The siblings miss each other so much they escape from their new homes and try their luck in Manila. As the kids go on one misadventure to another, their uncle, Lloyd Samartino is going out of his mind looking for them.

programme.title: Ang Babaeng Nawawala Sa Sarili
programme.desc: Dina Bonnevie plays Alvina, a young woman from a religious and conservative family, who was thought by everyone to be mad, but is in truth, being possessed by the devil.

programme.title: Lucas Abelardo
programme.desc: His sincerity and great dedication to his work is what distinguished police officer Lucas Abelardo from his other colleagues. But keeping to his principles while doing his job is not easy.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: When Rubble's fear of the dark derails the pup's Bark Yard campout, the Crew comes up with an idea to help him enjoy the starry night.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: When Pancakeio the Pancake Wizard takes all the pancakes in Axle City, it's up to Blaze, Stripes, and Starla to become superheroes! Using their Super Wheels, they've got to get those pancakes back- just in time for breakfast!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: Happy Holidays from Rubble & Crew and Truffles the pig, stars of Builder Cove's first-ever Christmas show...on ice! // When their winter day is snow-free, Rubble & Crew work to make all of Lucas and Lily's snow sledding dreams come true.

programme.desc: Peppa and George love jumping in puddles, even when it’s raining – but when George takes off his rain hat, he catches a cold. After a while George is feeling much better. Now he’s more than happy to wear his rain hat, even when it’s not raining.

programme.title: The Observers
programme.desc: The Observers on France 24 is a weekly show produced with photos, videos and personal accounts from Observers around the world. Top international current affairs are covered by using eyewitness accounts from Observers- people who are at the heart of an event. They send their photos and videos, which are verified and contextualized by France 24 team of professional journalists in Paris. The Observers are volunteers, and are not paid for their contributions.

programme.title: Deep in the Sea
programme.desc: Suspended psychiatrist Huang is asked to treat Zhao who suffers from schizophrenia. Zhao can only release himself from the pain of his girlfriend's death by killing people in his delusion. During the treatment, Huang is gradually affected by Zhao. He soon finds the way to cure Zhao, but then discovers an important secret about himself.

programme.title: The Occupant
programme.desc: Following the death of their mother, four estranged siblings find themselves fighting for their inheritance and their lives when an eccentric stranger arrives, claiming their haunted childhood home was left to her. They start to experience strange, inexplicable manifestations, which have malevolent effects on everyone in the house.

programme.title: 3AM
programme.desc: A taxi driver who is constantly judging others by his own standards, also reads into their every move and sets out to help ‘victims’ in his own way. When a woman he likes seems to be bullied by her son, he goes about setting things right for her, even resorting to turning himself into a cold-blooded serial killer…

programme.title: Bad Blood
programme.desc: A social worker takes a withdrawn homeless boy into her care, not suspecting that he is a vampire. As she gets closer to him, his thirst for human blood increases and to protect him, she must help lure his next kill to satisfy his cravings.

programme.title: Detective Dee: The Ghosts in Weird Town
programme.desc: Detective Dee investigates a series of terrifying vampire transformations in Youming Town, uncovering a sinister conspiracy masterminded by Prince Li Zhen, who plots to overthrow the empire. Armed with courage and ingenuity, Dee defeats the bloodthirsty vampires and ultimately exposes the prince’s dark ambitions.

programme.title: Behave
programme.desc: Following the death of their friend, a group of young adults travels to a villa on the outskirts of London that contains a deep mystery. As unsettling events escalate during their luxurious stay, they must unravel the villa’s dark secrets.

programme.title: Deep in the Sea
programme.desc: Suspended psychiatrist Huang is asked to treat Zhao who suffers from schizophrenia. Zhao can only release himself from the pain of his girlfriend's death by killing people in his delusion. During the treatment, Huang is gradually affected by Zhao. He soon finds the way to cure Zhao, but then discovers an important secret about himself.

programme.title: The Occupant

programme.title: Bad Blood
programme.desc: A social worker takes a withdrawn homeless boy into her care, not suspecting that he is a vampire. As she gets closer to him, his thirst for human blood increases and to protect him, she must help lure his next kill to satisfy his cravings.

programme.title: Sinister
programme.desc: Si Nan and her husband travel to Kuala Lumpur for a vacation to relieve her pregnancy stress. However, she soon uncovers his evil plan to turn their child into a 'Luk Krok' for profit, which puts her in grave danger. With the help of the hotel ghosts, she manages to flee and alert the police to arrest him, finally giving birth to her child.

programme.title: Tales of the Undeparted
programme.desc: Eight members of the Japanese idol group AKB48 gather at a temple to talk about their most mysterious and terrifying stories. As the group sits in a circle, each member shares a ghost story, urban legend, or paranormal activity found in Japanese folklore. They each holds a lit lantern, and as each story concludes, a lantern extinguishes…

programme.title: Jacqueline Comes Home: The Chiong Story
programme.desc: Based on a true crime that happened in 1997, the story is about an unknown assailant kidnapping two sisters, Jacqueline and Marijoy Chiong. This is one of the most shocking cases of rape and murder in Philippines history.

programme.title: Fate Jealous Greed
programme.desc: The film consists of three short horror stories: a man tries to survive after he received a haunted mail predicting his death; while a man mourns the death of his beloved wife, she becomes a ghost and tries to communicate with him; three brothers clash over the care options of their elderly mother during dinner, leading to a terrifying murder.

programme.title: The Ice Cream Truck
programme.desc: Mary moves back to her suburban hometown as her husband is relocated there for work. While waiting for her husband in their new house, Mary becomes the target of an evil slasher that stalks the suburbs in an ice-cream truck. She soon learns that the suburbs are not what they seem...

programme.title: Sinister

programme.title: Hoarders (S14)
programme.desc: Marjorie's husband, Irv, has recently been diagnosed with Parkinson's Disease and has already taken two dangerous falls in the house where the EMTs could not get to him.

programme.title: City Confidential (S8)
programme.desc: A brutal double murder shocks Northern California's peace-loving and laid-back Marin County. With residents reeling, police chase an elusive killer through three counties.

programme.title: City Confidential (S8)
programme.desc: A historic Texan town is stunned when a popular caretaker is found dead and a beloved resident goes missing. But with support from a concerned community, detectives uncover the secrets that led to murder.

programme.title: Lie Detector: Truth Or Deception
programme.desc: Years after Gary Coleman’s controversial and tragic death, his ex-wife agrees to take a polygraph test to confront lingering suspicions and silence the rumours that she was responsible for his death.

programme.title: Interrogation Raw (S2)
programme.desc: 26-year-old Timothy 'Rambo' Ramsey is killed in a drive-by shooting, but the investigation yields little evidence, and the case goes cold for six years.

programme.title: Cold Case Files (S3)
programme.desc: Chuck and Cheryl Hall are torn apart when Chuck finds Cheryl murdered. Though Cheryl's family is certain they know her killer, the law isn't as sure. After several decades, a DNA match erases all doubt.

programme.title: Booked: First Day In (S2)
programme.desc: A man in Modesto was apprehended by a K9 unit while fleeing from police; another was arrested while his family dog was bleeding in their backyard.

programme.title: Evil Up Close (S6)
programme.desc: Lakhvir Singh enjoyed cooking for Lucky Cheema, the man she loved. But when he left her to marry a much younger woman, Singh made the couple a meal that would turn out to be the last Lucky ever tasted.

programme.title: Hoarders (S14)
programme.desc: When Lia was ten, she became intrigued by her mother's many collectibles and started going to antique stores and estate sales with her and is where Lia suspects her hoarding compulsion originates.

programme.title: Murder At The Motel
programme.desc: November 23, 2014, Springfield, Oregon. A housekeeper at the Village Inn Motel calls police when she finds a guest unresponsive and cold to the touch.

programme.title: Cold Case Files: Murder In The Bayou
programme.desc: When the body of free-spirited Bonnie Ruphard, 47, is spotted by a runner in Lafayette, LA, police suspect domestic violence.

programme.title: Interrogation Cam
programme.desc: Detectives interrogate a woman accused of killing a lottery winner for his $30,000,000 prize; special agents press an ex-con about a missing 5-year-old girl and her dead babysitter; and more.

programme.title: Interrogation Cam
programme.desc: A 92-year-old woman tells investigators why she shot and killed her 72-year-old son; a detective tells a suspect that the man he’s accused of stabbing has died at the hospital; and more.

programme.title: Evil Up Close (S6)
programme.desc: Chef Philip Rolph was besotted with waitress Georgina Henshaw. But Phil realised she was using him for his money, and Georgina bragged to a friend that she was planning to kill him.

programme.title: Meet, Marry, Murder (S1)
programme.desc: When Toni meets Harold at a medical convention, they click and soon marry. But when money starts going missing from Toni's account, suspicion falls on Harold.

programme.title: Taking The Stand (S3)
programme.desc: During a road rage incident, Theodore Edgecomb shoots and kills immigration lawyer Jason Cleereman. Charging him with 1st-degree intentional homicide, the state contends it was a cold-blooded murder.

programme.title: #TextMeWhenYouGetHome (S2)
programme.desc: Residents of Robeson, Pennsylvania were stunned when Ashley Kline went missing on New Year's Eve. The 12-day search turned up several suspects until investigators uncovered suspicious text messages.

programme.title: First Blood (S1)
programme.desc: Before he hunted down his first victim in the wilds of Alaska, Robert Hansen was working at his father's bakery in a small town in Iowa, slowly developing an animosity towards women.

programme.title: C Dans L'Air
programme.desc: All the latest major events, presented, explained and analysed! Special guests and journalists in the studio analyse both the latest news but also other controversial issues to give us a better understanding of the social, political and cultural events occurring around us.

programme.title: Paname
programme.desc: Yvan Hallouin walks around Paris and its surroundings. In each stroll, the soul and identity of the 'City of Light' are examined through encounters with the local inhabitants and historical anecdotes.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Lévy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: 100 % Pur Poils
programme.desc: This is one of Europe's most famous animal parks. The zoo at La Barben, near Aix-en-Provence, is a benchmark in species conservation and acts as a refuge for animals that have been seized or abandoned. Visit with Louis Pons and Adeline Godefroy.

programme.title: L'Épicerie
programme.desc: The place to be for all those who are interested in what they put on their plates and all things relating to food. The programme: reports, surveys, taste tests, test benches, answers to questions from television viewers, including advice and simple but effective tricks.

programme.title: Comment Ça Va Le Nord ?
programme.desc: With only four hours of sunshine per day, winter in the Far North is particularly harmful for the environment as fossil fuels, such as diesel or propane, continue to provide the main source of electricity. Finding new ways of doing things is becoming crucial...

programme.title: 6H Info
programme.desc: The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Télévisions editorial team.

programme.title: Télématin
programme.desc: Information and good humour, 7 days a week! Resolutely in tune with the times, the first morning of France, strong of its editorial richness and its team dynamics, addresses many themes and deals with current events with seriousness and without dramatization.

programme.title: Télématin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week.

programme.title: L'Épicerie
programme.desc: The place to be for all those who are interested in what they put on their plates and all things relating to food. The programme: reports, surveys, taste tests, test benches, answers to questions from television viewers, including advice and simple but effective tricks.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete on arrow-word grids that they try to fill in by finding the answers to the given clues. But to access the clues, they must first answer questions with a very particular characteristic: the answer is always a letter.

programme.title: Le Téléjournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: 100 % Pur Poils
programme.desc: This is one of Europe's most famous animal parks. The zoo at La Barben, near Aix-en-Provence, is a benchmark in species conservation and acts as a refuge for animals that have been seized or abandoned. Visit with Louis Pons and Adeline Godefroy.

programme.title: Ligue 1 Mcdonald'S - Avant-Matchs
programme.desc: Presenting the next day of the French football championship.

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : C'Est Dans La Boîte !
programme.desc: Every day, Rocky and Lily receive a new box on the set. But what does it contain? It's always a surprising object that leads them to discover very different subjects: turtles, bowling or even cloud formation.

programme.title: Gigantosaurus
programme.desc: Four little dinosaurs, Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu, discover a dangerous world where the mysterious Gigantosaurus, the most ferocious of all the dinosaurs, is forever on the prowl. The four best friends set their heading for adventure, confronting their fears and working together to solve all their problems.

programme.title: Yétili
programme.desc: Nina and Léon, two little mice, live in a bookshop whose mascot is a large yeti cuddly toy called Yétili. Each evening, once the bookshop has closed, Yétili comes to life and settles his two friends on his knees to read them a story.

programme.title: Les Quiquoi
programme.desc: Olive, Pétole, Boulard, Mixo, Raoul and Pamela make up a full-of-fun gang known as the Quiquoi. Together they ask a host of existential questions, using drawings to find the answers. In their own quirky way, they love nothing better than creating surrealist worlds where everything becomes possible.

programme.title: Roi Keïta
programme.desc: The entire empire is on alert: Soundiata Keïta's mother has been kidnapped. Abdul, as thirsty for power as ever, heads to the city of the sacred baobab trees.

programme.title: Roi Keïta
programme.desc: The entire empire is on alert: Soundiata Keïta's mother has been kidnapped. Abdul, as thirsty for power as ever, heads to the city of the sacred baobab trees.

programme.title: Tout Le Monde Veut Prendre Sa Place
programme.desc: The game where everyone wants to be a winner. One quiz, six candidates and, comfortably installed in his chair, one champion... whom everyone dreams of unseating!

programme.title: La Fabuleuse Histoire Des Sciences Au Québec
programme.desc: When social science is no longer content to merely observe society but seeks to actively contribute to its evolution. Since the Quiet Revolution, activists and university researchers have worked hand in hand to question preconceived ideas, fight prejudice and encourage reflection.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Lévy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Les Chefs !
programme.desc: The finalists cook their dream menus, inspired by the most significant moments of their lives. At the end of this ultimate challenge, the judges must decide...

programme.title: Le Journal De France 2
programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (1 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.title: Les Trésors Des Ambassades Parisiennes
programme.desc: Embassies rank among the most beautiful residences in Paris. In these remarkable buildings, where diplomacy meets the history of France, hosting is elevated to an art form. A tour of these heritage gems, private mansions where all of Paris once gathered, often built or decorated by independent and wealthy women.

programme.title: Prodiges 2025
programme.desc: Singing, dancing, music: twelve young virtuosos aged 6 to 16 perform on stage and showcase their talent to the jury and the audience. The two best prodigies in each category will go to the final. They are accompanied by conductor Zahia Ziouani and the Divertimento orchestra.

programme.title: Lapin
programme.desc: Every Monday, a day off, Muriel Robin spends the evening at the home of Pierre Arditi. But tonight, for the first time, they realise that they are not alone, but much more... A play by Samuel Benchetrit, bringing Muriel Robin and Pierre Arditi together on stage for the first time.

programme.title: Ma Première Vente Des Vins À Beaune
programme.desc: When tradition, heritage and solidarity come together. Since 1859, the Hospices de Beaune wine sale has attracted thousands of visitors. The event helps to fund hospital projects and several charitable works. Dive into Burgundy's fascinating world of grand cru wines.

programme.title: Pompon Ours
programme.desc: Seven year-old Pompon is a little bear cub. Full of mischief, he also has a precious talent that delights his best friend Rita and his parents: he can take something ordinary and make it amazing. Thanks to his extraordinary imagination, growing up from day to day becomes child's play.

programme.title: La Famille Blaireau-Renard
programme.desc: Edmond is the father of three little badger cubs; all living happily in their sett. One day, he falls in love with Marguerite, a fox! Everything changes when Marguerite and her daughter move into the den; both families now have to find a way to live together in harmony!

programme.title: Bestioles En Questions
programme.desc: As a nature enthusiast, Émilie is very interested in the behaviour of insects and other small creatures. What do ants eat? Why are frogs slimy? Can a tortoise catch a cold? No question goes unasked!

programme.title: Les Métiers
programme.desc: To gain a better understanding of some professions, school children explain jobs to their parents in their own words.

programme.title: Kenda
programme.desc: Thanks to the help and support of her friends, Kenda tackles all those little everyday problems with optimism. The children's adventures also offer them an opportunity to understand the importance of human values and the world that surrounds them.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
